context_text: <A> so you know okay that was that was twenty two years ago and you're right the cost of living has escalated and the cost of goods the see the thing it's it's just such a dilemma because i i am a small business owner and i i don't have employees i just have me but if i was hiring people it would be very hard / <B> yeah / <A> because you know you've you gotta have a guaranteed income so that you know you can meet payroll so that you can meet the health benefit needs and all of those things have gone up in price and then you know the employee wants to be paid well jeeze so i you know i can understand the dilemma from a a business standpoint but from a a humanistic standpoint we can't expect people to live on this and then / <B> no / <A> and not provide them with services to help them out like childcare / <B> yeah / <A> um or other things that that will ease their burden you know / <B> yeah / <A> or or some type of a of a health benefit that will you know offset the money they're not making / <B> yeah
